assetSelector.info: Your pool balance remains separate from your trading activity and is available for use at any time.
assetSelector.assetInfo: The list will only display assets eligible for pooling.

poolSelector.info: Your redemption balance depends on amounts settled in your wallet. Settlement cycles happen daily at end of CET business day (GMT+1)

deposit.info_one: You will receive {{poolAssetValue}} {{poolAssetName}} token for pooling {{assetValue}} {{assetName}} token.
deposit.info_other: You will receive {{poolAssetValue}} {{poolAssetName}} tokens for pooling {{assetValue}} {{assetName}} tokens.

summary.title: You pool
summary.placeholderText: Add assets to the pool list
summary.feesDescription: Fees equivalent to 0.5% of the pooled amount are deducted from your EUR balance.

deposit.loadingHint: Pooling may take up to 1 min. Please wait for the process to complete.
deposit.successSubtitle: Your balances are now updated. Please note that there might be delays in reflecting transactions in your transaction history.

redeem.info_one: You will receive {{assetValue}} {{assetName}} token for redeeming {{poolAssetValue}} {{poolAssetName}} token.
redeem.info_other: You will receive {{assetValue}} {{assetName}} tokens for redeeming {{poolAssetValue}} {{poolAssetName}} tokens.

summary.title: You redeem
summary.placeholderText: Add assets to the redemption list
summary.feesDescription: Fees equivalent to 0.5% of the redeemed amount are deducted from your EUR balance.

redeem.loadingHint: Redeeming may take up to 1 min. Please wait until the process is completed.
redeem.successSubtitle: Your balances are now updated. Please note that there might be delays in reflecting transactions in your transaction history.
